Posts.Content: Jan 29, 2011 02:16PM LoriLS wrote: Just had my first chemo on Monday.  AC- and I am seeking someone else in the same boat.  Most people don't be the first one would be easy.  NOT.  I feel achy, tired, queasy, foggy, etc.  Please tell me it gets better!!!
Posts.Title: Those first few days of chemo... EmilyInOntario
